# Interactive apps with `shiny`

We will need

```{r}
library("shiny")
```

### Sharing

* Share the code file(s) and `runApp`
* `runUrl`
* `runGitHub`
* `runGist`
* [shinyapps](http://wwwshinyapps.io)
* Shiny server

## Shiny apps

Push your shiny apps online with [shinyapps](http://www.shinyapps.io/).
